segments.pli: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
segments.en: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:
‘Reverend, do you live the spiritual life with the ascetic Gotama so that you can be reborn in the realm of the gods?’

segments.pli: Nanu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṃ puṭṭhā aṭṭīyeyyātha harāyeyyātha jiguccheyyāthā”ti?
segments.en: Being questioned like this, wouldn’t you be horrified, repelled, and disgusted?”

segments.pli: “Iti kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dibbena āyunā aṭṭīyatha harāyatha jigucchatha, dibbena vaṇṇena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbenādhipateyyena aṭṭīyatha harāyatha jigucchatha;
segments.en: “So it seems that you are horrified, repelled, and disgusted by divine lifespan, beauty, happiness, fame, and sovereignty.

segments.pli: pageva kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhehi kāyaduccaritena aṭṭīyitabbaṃ harāyitabbaṃ jigucchitabbaṃ, vacīduccaritena … manoduccaritena aṭṭīyitabbaṃ harāyitabbaṃ jigucchitabban”ti.
segments.en: How much more then should you be horrified, embarrassed, and disgusted by bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.”
